languages.text: If wielder's Melee attack is Critical Hit, dodged or parried, wielder gains {uip|MP|9770450e394948eda42029e4b648221e} Movement Points and doesn't provoke Attacks of Opportunity until the end of their turn.

traits.locale_text: If wielder's Melee attack is Critical Hit, dodged or parried, wielder gains {uip|MP|9770450e394948eda42029e4b648221e} Movement Points and doesn't provoke Attacks of Opportunity until the end of their turn.

languages.text: If the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} (except the {g|f:6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de}Death From Above{/g} and {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Blade Dance{/g} abilities) is {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}, or scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, the wearer gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
languages.original_text: Если атака персонажа в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирована{/g}, если цель от нее {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонилась{/g} или если эта атака нанесла {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическое попадание{/g}, персонаж восстанавливает +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и не провоцирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g} до конца своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.

traits.locale_text: If the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} (except the {g|f:6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de}Death From Above{/g} and {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Blade Dance{/g} abilities) is {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}, or scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, the wearer gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

If the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} (except the {g|f:6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de}Death From Above{/g} and {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Blade Dance{/g} abilities) is {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}, or scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, the wearer gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

languages.text: Giyen kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırılarına{/g} ({g|f:6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de}Tepeden Yağan Ölüm{/g} ve {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Kılıç Dansı{/g} kabiliyetleri hariç) karşı {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} yapılırsa ya da bu saldırı {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş{/g} indirirse takan kişi, +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} kazanır ve {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} sonuna dek {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} tetiklemez.

Takan kişinin yakın dövüş saldırısına karşı {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} veya savuşturma yapılırsa ya da bu saldırı {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş{/g} indirirse takan kişi, +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} HP geri kazanır ve {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} sonuna dek fırsat saldırılarını tetiklemez.

Takan kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırılarına{/g} karşı {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} yapılırsa ya da bu saldırı{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş{/g} indirirse takan kişi, +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} geri kazanır ve {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} sonuna dek {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} tetiklemez.

languages.text: Si el {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} del portador (sin contar las capacidades {g|f:6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de}Muerte desde el cielo{/g} y {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Danza de espada{/g}) se {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g}, se {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}para{/g} o asesta un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g}, el portador gana +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y no provocará {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g} hasta el final de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.
languages.original_text: If the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} (except the {g|f:6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de}Death From Above{/g} and {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Blade Dance{/g} abilities) is {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}, or scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, the wearer gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Si el {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} del portador (sin contar las capacidades {g|f:6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de}Muerte desde el cielo{/g} y {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Danza de espada{/g}) se {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g}, se {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}para{/g} o asesta un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g}, el portador gana +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y no provocará {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g} hasta el final de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.

Si el ataque {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} del portador se {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g}, se {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}para{/g} o asesta un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g}, el portador recupera +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y no provocará {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g} hasta el final de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.

languages.text: 如果装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}（{g|f:6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de}死从天降{/g}与{g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}利刃之舞{/g}能力除外）被{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}、被{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}或造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}，则装备者恢复{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，且在{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束前不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。
languages.original_text: If the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} (except the {g|f:6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de}Death From Above{/g} and {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Blade Dance{/g} abilities) is {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}, or scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, the wearer gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 如果装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}（{g|f:6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de}死从天降{/g}与{g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}利刃之舞{/g}能力除外）被{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}、被{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}或造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}，则装备者恢复{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，且在{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束前不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。

languages.text: Wenn dem {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} des Trägers (mit Ausnahme der Fähigkeiten {g|f:6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de}Tod von oben{/g} und {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Klingentanz{/g}) {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausgewichen{/g} wird, wenn er {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pariert{/g} wird oder wenn er einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g} erzielt, erhält der Träger +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und provoziert bis zum Ende seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} keine {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g}.
languages.original_text: If the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} (except the {g|f:6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de}Death From Above{/g} and {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Blade Dance{/g} abilities) is {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}, or scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, the wearer gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wenn dem {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} des Trägers (mit Ausnahme der Fähigkeiten {g|f:6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de}Tod von oben{/g} und {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Klingentanz{/g}) {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausgewichen{/g} wird, wenn er {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pariert{/g} wird oder wenn er einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g} erzielt, erhält der Träger +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und provoziert bis zum Ende seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} keine {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g}.

languages.text: Si l'{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} du porteur (à l'exception des capacités {g|f:6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de}Mort venue du ciel{/g} et {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Danse des lames{/g}) est {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivée{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parée{/g} ou inflige un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g}, l'utilisateur gagne +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et ne provoque pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.
languages.original_text: If the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} (except the {g|f:6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de}Death From Above{/g} and {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Blade Dance{/g} abilities) is {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}, or scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, the wearer gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Si l'{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} du porteur (à l'exception des capacités {g|f:6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de}Mort venue du ciel{/g} et {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Danse des lames{/g}) est {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivée{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parée{/g} ou inflige un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g}, l'utilisateur gagne +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et ne provoque pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.

languages.text: 使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}された場合（{g|f:6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de}天からの死{/g}と{g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}ブレード・ダンス{/g}以外）、使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を+{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}回復し、{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を引き起こさない。
languages.original_text: If the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} (except the {g|f:6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de}Death From Above{/g} and {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Blade Dance{/g} abilities) is {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}, or scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, the wearer gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者の近接攻撃が回避、受け流し、クリティカルヒットされた場合、使用者のMPを+{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}回復し、ターンの終了まで機会攻撃を引き起こさない。
使用者の近接攻撃が回避、受け流し、クリティカルヒットされた場合、使用者のMPを+{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}回復し、ターンの終了まで機会攻撃を引き起こさない。

languages.text: Если атака персонажа в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} (кроме способностей {g|f:6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de}Смерть свыше{/g} и {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Танец клинков{/g}) нанесла {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическое попадание{/g}, или же цель избежала попадания {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированием{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонением{/g}, персонаж получает +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и не провоцирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g} до конца своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.
